summary: A few Armor sets inspired by Tali from Mass Effect
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15160-1-1334439052.jpg[/img]

I present to you, my humble attempt to create a Mass Effect inspired armor for Skyrim.
i know its not too lore friendly but lets just pretend :D.
It comes in 3 different color styles and two versions of each color, both being light armors.

The Blue Variant is a mage oriented set with enchantments like restoration and destruction bonus, magika regen and increased magika.

The Red Variant is more combat based and has increased stealth, increased stamina, improved smithing and extra health.

i made the Tali Armor version with no enchantment and should be enchantable with whatever you would like.

The Armor was based off of the CBBE body but should work with any bodymod.

How to Obtain;
Armor pieces can be created in forges. the \"Tali Armor\" is unique and can be found in Whiterun in a barrel near the entrance(above the Guard\'s Shack)

Any  feedback/constructive criticism/ bug reports is appreciated.
i would especially like some feedback on the stats of the armor.

[youtube]mfcPAX29Whs[/youtube]
[youtube]esNaLk-cqIE[/youtube]
[youtube]n78CUw3co-8[/youtube]

To Do List; 

weight slider.
skinning fixes to some of the armor pieces.
better textures for the boots/gloves

Modders resources; 

If a brave modder would like to retexture my armor let me know and i can send you some PSD files.

Update Log;

4/17/2012; uploaded new File with added helmets to all color variants. tweaked esp.
